title: Spit Poison (mutation)
data:
{| cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" border="1"
|- style="font-style:italic;" 
|Rank||Effect||Flavor
|-
|1||Grants the [[Spit Poison]] ability.||You can spit poison.
|-
|2||Upgrades to [[Poisonous Cloud|Breathe Poison]].||You can exhale a cloud of poison.
|- 
| colspan="3" |
'''Species notes:''' Exclusve to [[Naga]]s, who start at level 1.
|- style="font-style:italic;" 
| colspan="3" |
[[Good_mutations|Good mutation]]
|}
